column4: Wich video driver to choose in mplayer in order to watch the movie in full screen?
are you using the fglrx driver by any chance?
type lsmod |grep fglrx in a terminal
it's with a vertical line, right? ( | )
hmmm what graphics card do you have?
i can play the movie with x11 but it doesn't want ot go fullscreen
try gksudo gmplayer, does that work with xv?
